name: Alestorm Mexico
description:
CONTROLS: 

Escape - go back to menu, R Key - Restart Level, Space Key & Arrow Keys to move

If youre struggling you can set the number of lives in the Options menu!!!

HOW TO PLAY: 
  1.  Level: Space to shoot, arrow keys to move. Survive till the boss and beat him!
  2.  Level: Space to jump, Left Arrow to set up for 2 space jump, Right Arrow to set up for a 1 space jump. Pressing to get into a stance you already are in, makes you lose hp. Avoid all the cactuses and get past 40 spaces.
  3. Level: Left+Right Arrow to move, move with the donkey till you fill the Wash-O-Meter.
  4. Level: Left+Right Arrow to move, avoid boxes and tires, and get to the Woman.
  5. Level: Arrow Keys + Space, hit the notes when they overlap the UI.
GAME DESCRIPTION:

A fan made game based on a short gameplay video of the song Mexico from Alestorm.  Its still an unfinished game that requires a lot of polish and graphics to make it come together. Because of other projects and needing a break from this one i cant promise when or if ever it will be completely finished. But i still wanted to post it because i really enjoyed making this small game!  And i hope you enjoy it as well or ill have to get my anchor! <3

Alestorm Mexico original song: (5) ALESTORM - Mexico (Official Video) | Napalm Records - YouTube

Music+Menu animation: (5) Alestorm - Mexico [8-bit] - YouTube

Last Leve note pattern: Alestorm - Mexico [LMBECIL1832, sVmAcHiNe].zip - Google Drive

SADLY:

Unitys video player isnt that great for WebGl builds so this will only be a release for windows. 

And the 5th level is a bit out of sync, i tried for so long, but nothing worked. :((
